identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.description: A fusion of organic vitality and digital precision. High-contrast, energetic, and clean.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix nature (organic shapes) with tech (Swiss grids).
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'healthy' and 'energetic'.
Content is King: Products are the heroes; UI is the stage.
Zoom In: Bold, large product imagery.
Negative Space: Luxurious white space to breathe.

general: Use 'Outfit' font for all Headings (h1-h6) and 'Manrope' for body text.
Implement the 'Bio-Kinetic' theme: lots of white space, vibrant green accents, and smooth motion.
Do NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle fades.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Use `shadcn/ui` components for complex interactions (Dialog, Sheet, Dropdown) but style them to match the 'Bio-Kinetic' theme (rounded-3xl, green focus rings).
For the Admin Panel, keep it strictly minimal: White background, black text, 1px gray borders. No heavy shadows.

home.hero: Full-width video slider (use placeholder video if needed, or the lifestyle image). Overlay text must be readable (use glassmorphism).
home.products: Use a 'Spotlight' grid. Cards should be clean white with large images. On hover, show 'Add to Cart' button.
home.testimonials: Use a marquee effect for trust signals.

product_detail.layout: Split screen. Left: Sticky image gallery. Right: Scrollable details.
product_detail.actions: Sticky 'Add to Cart' bar on mobile.

cart.layout: Slide-over drawer for quick access, full page for checkout.
cart.payment: Highlight 'Bank Transfer / IBAN' clearly with a copy-to-clipboard feature.

admin.layout: Sidebar navigation (collapsible). Main content area with 'Card' based widgets.
admin.dashboard: Key metrics (Orders, Revenue) in top row. Recent orders table below.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
